shareableLinkCopied: Ссылка для распространения скопирована в буфер обмена. Нажмите здесь, чтобы просмотреть скриншот.
yourFilesCouldntBeAdded: Ваши файлы не могут быть добавлены.
folderAddedToIpfsClickToView: Folder { name } added to IPFS. Click to view the folder.
fileAddedToIpfsClickToView: File { name } added to IPFS. Click to view the file.
desktopIsStartedButDaemonOffline: IPFS Desktop запущен но daemon выключен.
errorWhileWritingFiles: Произошла ошибка при записи файлов в вашу файловую систему.
hashDownloadedClickToView: Содержимое хэша { hash } скачано. Нажмите, чтобы увидеть.
clickToInstall: Нажмите здесь, чтобы перезапустить и установить более новую версию IPFS Desktop.
runningLatestVersion: You seem to be running the latest version.

polkitDialog.title: Polkit not found
polkitDialog.message: IPFS can't be added to /usr/local/bin/ without polkit agent.

noPermissionDialog.title: No permission
noPermissionDialog.message: IPFS couldn't be added to /usr/local/bin/, either because you entered the wrong password, or you denied permission.

ipfsNotRunningDialog.title: IPFS не запущен
ipfsNotRunningDialog.message: IPFS needs to be running to perform this action. Do you want to start the daemon?

recoverableErrorDialog.title: An error has occurred
recoverableErrorDialog.message: An error occurred but it does not prevent the execution of IPFS Desktop. You can either inspect the logs for yourself or report the error to the developers.

cannotConnectToApiDialog.title: Cannot connect to API
cannotConnectToApiDialog.message: IPFS Desktop cannot connect to the API address provided: { addr }.

ipfsDesktopHasShutdownDialog.title: IPFS Desktop has shutdown
ipfsDesktopHasShutdownDialog.message: IPFS Desktop has shutdown because of an error. You can restart the app or report the error to the developers, which requires a GitHub account.
